title: It's All About Amy
overview: It's All About Amy is a fly on the wall reality television series based on the life of Amy Childs, her family and friends. The series takes place in 2011 after Childs has left the Big Brother house and begins investing in many businesses, including her salon. The series also shows Childs as she continues to model and present on television. Childs' mother Julie, father Billy and brother Billy Jr. appear, along with manager Claire Powell. Cousin and The Only Way Is Essex star Harry Derbridge also appears in the series.
